SEARCH
Package fr.insalyon.model

Class DataModel

java.lang.Object
fr.insalyon.model.DataModel
public class DataModel extends Object
Class used to store the data needed by the controllers It contains a city map, a list of tours and a list of couriers.
See Also:
  • CityMap
  • Tour
  • Courier
